description:
To paraphrase Einstein, "You cannot solve a problem with the same thinking that caused the problem."

This hypnosis class will change the way you think and, more importantly, the way you feel about smoking.

All hypnosis is self hypnosis... You are the talent and Jim guides you through a process to meet your challenges head on...

Enroll in a class with Jim to live life with a purpose and become the person you always dreamed of as a child. A hypnosis class with Jim will lead to self discovery. Whether you want to quit smoking, lose weight or have the self confidence for a job interview. You will discover the gift within you.
title: Hypnosis -  Learn to become a non-smoker with Jim Hoke
